New Records: Anthony Volpe hit a grand slam in the third inning

Austin Wells hit a home run in the sixth inning
Gerrit Cole will pitch for the Yankees in Game 5

Pre-Game Insights: The goal of LA was to get through a bullpen game without using their big bullpen pieces

Post-Match Reflections: The Yankees stave off elimination with Game 4 win
New York are the first team since 1970 to extend a World Series to a fifth game when down three games to none

The Yankees' bats awaken for Game 4 win over Dodgers
